select IFNULL(count(*),0) empMaxNum from (select employee.emp_name emp_name, /*사원이름*/ department.dept_name dept_name, /*부서명*/ rank.rank_name rank_name /*직급명*/ from employee join department on employee.dept_code = department.dept_code join rank on employee.rank_code = rank.rank_code where employee.emp_del_yn ='N'
and dept_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWd},'%')
and rank_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWd},'%')
and emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWd},'%')
)x

select x.empEmno, /*사원코드*/ x.empName, /*사원명*/ x.deptName, /*부서명*/ x.empRegDate, /*등록날짜*/ rank.rank_name rankName /*직급명*/ from (select emp_emno empEmno, /*사원코드*/ emp_name empName, /*사원명*/ dept_name deptName, /*부서명*/ rank_code rankCode, /*등록날짜*/ emp_reg_date empRegDate /*직급명*/ from employee left join department on employee.dept_code = department.dept_code where employee.emp_del_yn ='N')x left join rank on x.rankCode = rank.rank_code where 1=1
and x.deptName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWd},'%')
and rank.rank_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWd},'%')
and x.empName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWd},'%')
limit #{noticeCount},#{viewNoticeMaxNum}

select x.empEmno, /*사원코드*/ x.empName, /*사원명*/ x.empAdminYn, /*관리자여부*/ x.deptName, /*부서명*/ rank.rank_name rankName /*직급명*/ from (select emp_emno empEmno, /*사원코드*/ emp_name empName, /*사원명*/ emp_admin_yn empAdminYn, /*관리자여부*/ dept_name deptName, /*부서명*/ rank_code rankCode /*직급명*/ from employee left join department on employee.dept_code = department.dept_code where employee.emp_del_yn ='N')x left join rank on x.rankCode = rank.rank_code where x.empEmno = #{empEmno}
mapper.update: update employee set emp_admin_yn=#{empClass} where emp_emno=${empEmno}
mapper.select: select mn_no mnNo, /*메뉴코드*/ atr_attr atrAttr, /*권한메뉴속성*/ atr_aplystrt atrAplyStrt, /*권한적용시작날짜*/ atr_aplyfini atrAplyFini, /*권한적용종료날짜*/ atr_updtstrt atrUpdtStrt, /*데이터접근시작날짜*/ atr_updtfini atrUpdtFini /*데이터접근종료날짜*/ from authority where mn_no = #{mnNo} and emp_emno = #{empEmno}
select MN_NO mnNo, /*메뉴코드*/ MN_ATTR mnAttr, /*메뉴속성*/ MN_NAME mnName, /*메뉴명*/ MN_URL mnUrl /*메뉴 URL*/ from menu where mn_no = #{mnNo}
mapper.insert: insert into authority ( EMP_EMNO, /*사원코드*/ MN_NO, /*메뉴명*/ ATR_ATTR, /*권한속성*/ ATR_APLYSTRT, /*권한시작날짜*/ ATR_APLYFINI, /*권한종료날짜*/ ATR_UPDTSTRT, /*데이터접근시작날짜*/ ATR_UPDTFINI) /*데이터접근종료날짜*/ values ( #{empEmno}, #{mnNo}, #{atrAttr}, #{atrAplyStrt}, #{atrAplyFini}, #{atrUpdtStrt}, #{atrUpdtFini} );
mapper.update: UPDATE authority SET ATR_ATTR = #{atrAttr}, /*권한속성*/ ATR_APLYSTRT = #{atrAplyStrt}, /*권한시작날짜*/ ATR_APLYFINI = #{atrAplyFini}, /*권한종료날짜*/ ATR_UPDTSTRT = #{atrUpdtStrt}, /*데이터접근시작날짜*/ ATR_UPDTFINI = #{atrUpdtFini} /*데이터접근종료날짜*/ where EMP_EMNO = #{empEmno} /*사원코드*/ and MN_NO = #{mnNo} /*메뉴코드*/
